Description: Lower body and conical foot sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style patterned, pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with reserved dot in centre; exterior: reserved on bowl and at junction with foot; glazed streaky black on outside of foot; inscription on reserved underside.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding squat patterned chalices, see Lemos no. 1062 from Kamiros.
Bibliographic references: Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 171, no. 65a)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0908) (phase 2)
